title: Matt Beckstrom
text:
Matt Beckstrom
Matthew Beckstrom is a librarian, author, professor, manager, privacy and security specialist, educator, and researcher with interests in libraries, education, privacy, security, intellectual freedom, information science, cyber- security, technology, and management.
